sn54.5:1.1: “Anapanassati, bhikkhave, bhavita bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn54.5:1.2: Katham bhavita ca, bhikkhave, anapanassati katham bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa?
sn54.5:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va nisidati pallankam abhujitva ujum kayam panidhaya parimukham satim upatthapetva.
sn54.5:1.6: Evam bhavita kho, bhikkhave, anapanassati evam bahulikata mahapphala hoti mahanisamsa.
sn54.5:2.1: Evam bhavitaya kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatiya evam bahulikataya satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha.
sn54.5:2.4: no ce dittheva dhamme patikacca annam aradheti.
sn54.5:2.6: no ce dittheva dhamme patikacca annam aradheti, no ce maranakale annam aradheti.
sn54.5:2.7: Atha pancannam orambhagiyanam samyojananam parikkhaya antaraparinibbayi hoti …
sn54.5:2.12: evam bhavitaya kho, bhikkhave, anapanassatiya evam bahulikataya ime satta phala sattanisamsa patikankha”ti.
